== Main Inclusion Report for vgabios ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' <nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/v/vgabios]]</nowiki>; arch:all package
# ''Rationale:''
** Dependency of kvm
 0. ''Security:''
** No known security vulnerabilities.
** No known source code review. 
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:vgabios|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>: None of particular interest.
** <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.debian.org/v/vgabios.html|Maintenance in Debian]]</nowiki> is decent.
** <nowiki>[[http://www.nongnu.org/vgabios/|Upstream]]</nowiki> is very calm, but I don't belive it's dead.
** <nowiki>[[http://savannah.nongnu.org/bugs/?group=vgabios|Upstream bug tracker]]</nowiki>: None of interest.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Complies with <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>.
** Packaging system (debhelper/cdbs/dbs) is straighforward debhelper. quilt is used for patch management.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** Build-Depends: debhelper (>= 5), quilt (>= 0.40)
** Build-Depends-Indep: bcc, bin86, gawk | awk
** All are in main.
 0. ''Background information:''
** vgabios is the bios for the emulated graphics card of qemu and kvm (and likely others).
